Get Involved

Current Opportunities

  • Funding Call Now Open: AI for Research and Innovation

    We are delighted to announce that our 2024 funding call in collaboration with the Cambridge Centre for Data Driven Discovery (C2D3) is now live!

    Read More

  • AI Clinic

    The AI Clinic seeks to support Cambridge University researchers using AI in their research, by helping resolve engineering issues they might encounter when implementing machine learning methods.

    Read More

  • Python and Pandas E-Learning Module

    An open e-learning module from Accelerate and Cambridge Spark offering training in Python programming for research challenges.

    Read More
